oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Subproject 2: Sheep: Ethical Problems and Breeding Goals
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stefanakis, Alexandros
Sotiraki, Smaros
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding and genetics
Sheep and goats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
- Lately production of various sheep and goat products has been raised especially in Mediterranean countries which have a long tradition in breeding such animals
- Sheep and goat breeding in those countries in fact in the best choice in order to exploit the specific area and climate conditions
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Stefanakis, Alexandros and Sotiraki, Smaros (2011) Subproject 2: Sheep: Ethical Problems and Breeding Goals. Paper at: First LowInputBreeds Symposium on Ethical Consideration in Livestock Breeding, Wagningen, The Netherlands, March 15 and 16, 2011. [Completed]
